description: User interface widgets for customer management, customer details, and customer analytics display

components.CustomerDetailsDialog: Comprehensive customer details modal with analytics, ticket history, and service frequency analysis.

rules: Large modal dialog design with 1200px max width and 90% screen height for comprehensive customer information display.
Professional header with customer avatar, name, membership badge, contact information, and dark navy styling.
Split layout: 320px left sidebar for customer overview and analytics, expandable right side for ticket history.
Customer analytics display: total spent, visit count, average spent per visit, and last visit date with color-coded stats.
Service frequency analysis showing top 5 most frequent services with usage count and percentage calculations.
MobX Observer integration for reactive updates when customer data changes through store interactions.
Date range filtering for ticket history with DateTimeRange picker and formatted date display.
Ticket card display with comprehensive information: ticket number, status, services, pricing, and technician details.
Dynamic avatar colors based on customer name with consistent color assignment across application sessions.
Membership level badges with color coding: gold, platinum, VIP with distinct visual styling.
Status color coding for tickets: green (completed/paid), blue (in-service), orange (queued), red (cancelled).
Service breakdown in tickets showing individual service names, prices, duration totals, and per-service averages.
Professional styling with proper shadows, borders, rounded corners, and consistent spacing throughout.
Empty state handling for customers with no ticket history showing appropriate placeholder messaging.
Responsive date formatting: relative dates for recent visits, absolute dates for older history.
Customer notes display with text overflow handling and proper formatting for additional customer information.
Integrated CustomersStore dependency for accessing customer analytics and ticket data through computed properties.
Business metrics display including revenue information, technician assignments, and service duration calculations.
Professional layout with proper container constraints, scroll handling, and visual hierarchy.
Theme integration using AppColors and AppTextStyles for consistent brand styling across customer management.

components.CustomerListItem: Compact customer list item with avatar, contact info, analytics, and action menu for customer management lists.

rules: Compact list item design optimized for customer browsing with essential information and analytics display.
Customer avatar with consistent color assignment based on name for visual identification across sessions.
Membership level badges with color coding: gold, platinum, VIP with distinct visual styling for tier recognition.
Contact information display showing phone and email with fallback handling for missing information.
Customer analytics integration displaying total spent and visit count in highlighted stat containers.
Last visit date formatting with relative time display: Today, Yesterday, days/weeks ago, or absolute date.
PopupMenuButton integration providing edit and delete actions with appropriate iconography and colors.
Professional card styling with shadows, borders, rounded corners, and proper touch feedback.
Action callbacks for tap, edit, and delete operations enabling parent component integration.
Color-coded statistics: blue for total spent, green for visit count emphasizing key business metrics.
InkWell integration providing Material Design touch feedback with proper border radius matching container.
Responsive layout handling varying content lengths and maintaining consistent visual hierarchy.
Theme integration using AppColors and AppTextStyles for consistent brand styling throughout application.
Membership badge visibility logic hiding 'Regular' membership while highlighting premium tiers.
Professional spacing and alignment ensuring clean list display with proper information hierarchy.
